revision.comment: clean up, replaced: cpu1_brand → cpu1brand, cpu1_model → cpu1model, cpu1_cspeed → cpu1spd, fla1_brand → fla1chipbrand, fla1_model → fla1chipmodel, fla1= → flash1size=, ram1= → ram1size=, ram1_brand → ram1chipbrand, ram1_model → ram1chipmodel, expansion_if_types → exp_if_types, expansion_usb_num → exp_usb_num, wi1_chip2_brand → rad1chip2brand, wi1_chip2_model → rad1chip2model, wi1_802dot11_protocols → rad1stand, wi1_txchains → rad1txchains, wi1_rxchains → rad1rxchains, wi1_sstreams → rad1sstre...
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand = T-Com |model = Speedport |revision = Plus |wlclass = AC1200
|type = dsl modem, wireless router
|cpu1chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |cpu1brand=Intel (Lantiq) |cpu1model=PXB 4389;PXB4389EL, XWAY GRX389, SLLF4; |cpu1spd = 600
|fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |fla1chipbrand=Toshiba |fla1chipmodel=TC58BVG0S3HTA00 |flash1size = 128
|ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1chipbrand=Winbond |ram1chipmodel=W971GG6SB-25 |ram1_num = 2
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |lan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1
|pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn = barrel
|flags = VDSL2, VoIP |addchip = xDSL AFE;Intel (Lantiq);PSB 80518;VRX518;;1;,,, VoIP Chip (2x FXS);Intel (Lantiq);PEF 42068;PEF 42068, V V1.2 (SLIC120), PEF42068VV12, S627NNP8, SLL98;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Sagemcom |manuf_model = F@ST 5352 |manuf_rev = TMPL
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip2brand=Intel (Lantiq) |rad1chip2model=PSB 82312;XWAY WRX312, PSB82312M, S8164K02, SLLJ5; |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2chip1brand=Intel (Lantiq) |rad2chip1model=PSB83522M;PSB83522M, Intel, WAV500, SLLQK; |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac
